# gdp per capita
url_link = "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_countries_by_GDP_(nominal)_per_capita"
browseURL(url_link)
gdp_per_capita_table = url_link  %>%
  read_html()  %>%  html_nodes(xpath='//*[@id="mw-content-text"]/div/table/tbody/tr[2]/td[1]/table') %>%
  html_table()

gdp_per_capita_df = as.data.frame(gdp_per_capita_table)
head(gdp_per_capita_df)
